title: Bboying 101
description:
Open class with basic stretching.
Briefly explain the fundamental elements of B-boying.

Toprock is the foremost opening display of style and introduction to any move.

Footwork is movement on the floor with hands supporting the dancer as much as the feet involving variations using knees and threading limbs.

Freezes are stylish poses suspending the off the ground using upper body strength. It is often signaled the completion of one's set.

Power moves are acrobatic moves that require momentum, speed, endurance, strength, and control creating circular momentum. (advanced)

Flavor is about combining all the elements, learning musicality, and developing one's own style.

Last 15 minutes of class, all participants will join together in a fun dance cypher to let loose and show what they've learned.
print_description: Bboying 101 with Xzist

title: Miso Soup
description:
Our goal for this "Miso soup camp" is to prevent electrolyte imbalance for Burners. 
According to wikipedia, Pure miso paste nutritional information: Although high in sodium (over 400% DV), one cup (275 g) of miso paste is an excellent source of dietary fiber (59%) and protein (64% DV), as well as a good source of minerals . Miso paste is also high in amino acids, the basic building blocks of protein. An excellent source of vitamin K and a decent source of riboflavin (38% DV), miso also provides small amounts of other vitamins. One major benefit of miso is its extremely high omega-3 and omega-6 fatty acid content.
We believe Miso saves Burners life on the Playa and leave them with good health all day.
print_description:
Come and have fabulous morning Miso soup with us.
Made by Japanese team. :)

title: The G-Spot Party: The Motel (3  & E)
description:
For several years, our camp has presented the Motel which offered BM guests a chance to have fun as well as to entertain their fellow Burners with safe adult entertainment.  We have provided a motel motif that includes clean bedding, an ice bucket, and other classic motel environs to promote what adults do in such situations.  At the same time, their shadows are projected on the fabric walls to entertain the outside guests with their ‘shadow play.’  This is the perfect melding of the voyeurs and exhibitionists that populate BRC.  For many of our previous guests, our motel has provided them an opportunity to do something they may have only dream of prior, but in a playful and anonymous manner.  This is our contribution to what we consider one of the most important aspects to a great BM experience; it is not a spectator sport!
Also - there will be free CDs - Our gift to you!!!

title: 2012 Nevada Burners Photo Shoot - ALIENVATION
description:
Most all of us that live here in Nevada were born in another state, nation, galaxy, time, or universe.  

Everyone that goes to Burning Man come from different places, and then they go home afterwards.  

But we stay and love it here in wonderfully strange Nevada.

The fact is, there are more Nevada Burners per capita than any other nation in the universe -- but there will be all these Burning Man Virgins this year playing in our backyard!

It's that time again.  It's time to take it to The Man and let him, and everyone else know, who we are, and where in the hell we stand, dammit...

AlieNVation!

Please join your fellow Nevada Burners in Black Rock City for a distinguished group photo at 4pm SHARP on Thurdsay, August 30, at The Man (6:00 side).

Of course, please don your finest what-not as representative of being a so-called "Nevadan," hahaha!

Participarty will ensue surrounding this photo shoot.  Mingling, stories, amazing feats, rousing spirituals, ...and booze and music too!

Please bring all your fellow Nevada Burner kin, from whatever state, nation, or planet they originally sprouted from.

The group photo will be freely available to download following the Burning Man, and you can still see the photos of previous years, all here:

tinyurl.com/NevadaBurnersPhotoShoot
print_description: Please join your fellow Nevada Burners for a group photo at 4pm SHARP on Thurdsay, August 30, at The Man (6:00 side).

title: 2012 Temple of Alchemy Guided Tours
description: Tour Sacred Spaces' 2012 "Temple of Alchemy" - Learn the science & explore the role of mysticism & metaphor in the language of alchemical principles.Temple curator Rio Gordon writes:"An exploration through the various heretical, metallurgic, Kabbalistic, numerological, and zodiacal principles of the "science" of Alchemy is given in this presentation. Also explored is the role of mysticism and metaphor in the language of alchemical principles, wherein these descriptions are an allegory for spiritual human transformation as described by C.G. Jung and others. The development of images, art forms, and physical scientific practices is noted, as is the impact of this mystical practice on fields as diverse as medicine, chemistry, and meditation. Please join us for this deep look at alchemy as an idea, an act of art making, and a rebellious act of defiance."
print_description: Tour Sacred Spaces' 2012 "Temple of Alchemy" - Learn the science & explore the role of mysticism & metaphor in the language of alchemical principles.

title: 48 Hour Film Project Kickoff: Black Rock City
description: The 48 Hour Film Project is a wild opportunity in which you and a team make a movie—write, shoot, edit and score it—in just 48 hours. At the kickoff, you get a character, a prop, a line of dialogue, and a genre, all to include in your movie. 48 hours later, the movie must be complete. Then it will be shown at our "On the Red Carpet Premiere" on Thursday evening, August 30th at 11 PM at our Playa Theater (with an Encore Show on Friday, August 31st at 10 PM). If you have a team and equipment, start at your leisure and follow the instructions on posters found at PlayaInfo and Videogasm (in Snowflake Village).  If you want to get people for your team or join a team, come on down to Videogasm at 8:15 and Edelweiss in Snowflake Village on Tuesday at 3pm. The 48 Hour Film Project's mission is to advance filmmaking and promote filmmakers. Through its festivals the Project encourages filmmakers and would-be filmmakers to get out there and make movies. The tight deadline of 48 hours puts the focus squarely on the filmmakers—emphasizing creativity and teamwork skills. While the time limit places an unusual restriction on the filmmakers, it is also liberating by putting an emphasis on "doing" instead of "talking."Note: Anyone making a video must first fill out a personal use form and get a camera tag from Media Mecca in Center Camp.
print_description: Make a short film (within 48 Hours) and have it premiered, all while on the Playa! The 48HFP occurs in cities in the US and throughout the world.

title: 5Rhythms/SheddingSkins: Movement & Sound Alchemy
description:
The essence of this elemental, sensational, physical life is body and breath...movement and sound. We will dance and discover the movement and sound of our body, the connection to the elemental world and how this earthly power moves from within, shaping our dance, breath and tone. From here we will merge with the divine spirit already present in and around our being and from this fully empowered sense of self we shall open the 5th chakra fully and give breath to our own true heart song.

For more information about 5Rhythms teacher Eugene Hedlund, visit his website - http://www.sheddingskins.com/
print_description: In this 5Rhythms class, we will dance/discover the movement/sound of our body, the connection to the elemental world & how the power moves from within

title: 5 Rhythms Workshop w/Dagmar Cee
description:
Want to know more about Gabrielle Roth’s 5Rhythms movement practice? Join guest teacher from Berlin, Germany Dagmar Cee for this 2 hour class and be gently guided through each of the rhythms: flowing, staccato, chaos, lyrical and stillness. Each rhythm focuses on a simple movement quality rather than a specific form or set of steps, giving everyone the freedom to move in ways that feel authentic without any pressure to get it right. With a little instruction, the experience of the 5Rhythms opens us deeply and helps us move beyond self-consciousness to an authentic connection to our body and life force. Using the discipline of each rhythm and the breath as a catalyst for movement, you will be invited to embody, follow, express, and release your own energy. In the end, you will find yourself renewed and reconnected to your own self, feeling fully alive.

http://www.5rhythms-berlin.de/
print_description: Want to know more about Gabrielle Roth’s 5Rhythms movement practice? Come to this 2 hour-class and be gently guided through each of the rhythms

title: A bacon pancake?
description:

title: Achieving Groundedness: Chi & Pranayama
description: Fertility is creation. Being grounded is a huge step towards achieving a more fruitful, balanced, creative, and loving life. whether it's daily stresses from work, the relationships in our lives, or many other variables that our mind occupies itself with, often we lose track of our path because we get too caught up. we lose our groundedness. this means more than just being rooted into the earth i.e. feeling secure. groundedness is a connection that our mind, body and spirit has to earth, to the universe, and to each other. when this connection becomes stronger, distractions and stresses no longer slow us down. what really matters to you becomes clear and letting go of that which does not serve you becomes easier and easier. this 60 minute class will use different techniques from chi, pranayama, and meditation to achieve higher ground and enlightenment!
print_description: Fertility is creation. Being grounded is a huge step towards achieving a more fruitful, balanced, creative, and loving life.

title: Actoroke (Karaoke for actors)
description:
Instead of singing popular songs in front of a live audience, act out scenes from popular movies! What kind of movies? Romances, of course!

Here’s how it works: come by and just watch if you like. Then if you decide you’d like to participate throw your name into one or more of the following hats: “straight male, straight female, gay male, or lesbian female.” When it’s time for a new scene we will decide whether it’s straight, gay, or lesbian (based on interest) and draw two names out of the appropriate hat(s) to determine who from the audience will play the two romantic leads. Then we will view a scene from a romance movie, “the kiss”, the scene in the movie where the leads “connect.”

After viewing this scene, our Baggage Check film director will direct the two randomly selected volunteers from the audience in recreating this scene, acting out the roles of the romantic leads, while our film crew captures the moment. For example, we might announce that the next scene will be a straight scene and we'd draw names from the straight male and straight female hats. Then we'd announce the movie as, for example, African Queen, and the man and woman selected would play the roles of Humphrey Bogart and Kathrine Hepburn. We would watch the scene on the boat when they've just successfully run the rapids and they kiss for the first time. Then the chosen actors would act out that scene.

Then while we repeat this process for more scenes we will edit the results of earlier scenes so that we can view them later in the evening, as they are edited.
print_description: Instead of singing, act out scenes from romance movies.  Fair warning, you might end up kissing someone!  We support all sexual preferences.

title: Acupuncture for the Body, Soul, and Mind
description:
Come and receive an acupuncture treatment in our community space and experience bliss as your meridians are realigned and rejuvenated. Our acupuncturist runs a community-based acupuncture clinic in Colorado and has brought her needles and skills to the playa for your healing needs. You won't want to miss this opportunity! Come early as treatment will be limited to the first 10-15 burners who come by. See you there!

Denver Community Acupuncture is a fully licensed and board certified holistic health center conveniently located off I-25 and Speer Blvd in the Highlands neighborhood of Denver. Our mission is to provide affordable acupuncture, Chinese herbal medicine, massage therapy, naturopathic medicine, psychotherapy, and skin care to everyone in our community. We work together with our patients and other practitioners in our office to formulate individualized wellness plans that utilize our knowledge of healthy living for a healthy community.
print_description: Receive an acupuncture treatment in our community space. Experience bliss as your meridians are realigned and rejuvenated. Come early, space limited!

title: Alia @ RhythmWave
description:
ALIA can take a room into deep ecstasy with her bright energy and serpentine movements drawing from her training as a dance performer and her devotion to embodying the feminine, never playing anything that she herself won't move to. 

She has had a life-long love affair with music and dance - they are her spiritual practice and her most potent passions. ALIA transmits the bliss she experiences in performances to create a connected, alive and activated experience that evokes the sacred and awakens our connection to our source through rhythm and movement. She approaches every set as a ritual and as a facilitator of dance floor unity. 

ALIA has shared the stage with the likes of Beats Antique, Random Rab, Govinda, Freq Nasty, Marty Party, An-ten-nae, Heyoka, Pussymonster, Sasha Rose, Vibesquad, DJ Jocelyn, and Bay Area favorite DJ Dragonfly.

On Soundcloud at www.soundcloud.com/aliarhythms

On YouTube at www.youtube.com/aliarhythms

On Twitter at www.twitter.com/alia_rhythms
print_description: Back by popular demand - Alia (formerly Bombgoddess) will take the dance floor into deep ecstasy with her bright energy and serpentine beats

title: Annie Oak - Developing a Community Tea House Model
description:
Serving on the playa for the second year, the Saraswati Tea House is
developing a model for community Tea Houses that offer guests a place
to rest, rehydrate and participate in the Chinese Gong Fu tea ritual. This
form of compassionate hospitality is particularly helpful for people under
stress on their journeys who need a calm place to center
themselves. This talk explores how Tea Houses can provide harm reduction
services and welcome refreshment in challenging environments.
print_description: Annie Oak, founder of the Women's Visionary Congress, discusses the Saraswati Tea House as a model for developing community Tea Houses.

title: Anti M's Home for Wayward Art
description: Anti M's Home for Wayward Art is a place for small art, medium art, amateur art, but especially Bad Art, Lost Art, Found Art, Art which Needs a Good Spanking, and of course, Wayward Art. This is not a gallery, it is more like juvenile detention for art, an orphanage, a half-way house for misfit art. All art in the Home is up for adoption, all the prospective new parent needs to do is fill out a small adoption form and clip it to the Home in place of their newfound art darling. Art may also be committed to the Home, just put it securely in place and say good-bye. While the emphasis is on visual art such as paintings, drawings and photos, sculptural art and trinkets found their way into the Home last year and then found new homes. Daytime only.
print_description: Got art? Adopt misguided art at the Home for Wayward Art, or donate art for others to enjoy.  Even Bad Art needs a loving home.

title: Aphrodite’s Conversational Alchemy (Women Only)
description: Dear goddesses: What happens when we treat our stories as sacred jewels? Come dance & play with words as prayer, as energy healing, as divine offering
print_description: Dear goddesses: What happens when we treat our stories as sacred jewels? Come dance & play with words as prayer, as energy healing, as divine offering

title: Apres Naked Pub Crawl Manplay
description: Open 24/7 during Burning Man, Down Low Club's discreet, enclosed and air-cooled manplay tent at 7:45 Edelweiss is fully outfitted for hot 18+ man-to-man action with other adult Gay/Bi/Curious men of the Playa. Today it's the perfect venue for frisky and woozy naked pub crawlers to stagger in, cool down, let their inhibitions go and create some man-to-man heat.  Remember, at Down Low Club our credo is: What happens at Burning Man, stays at Burning Man...
print_description: After Naked Pub Crawl frisky & woozy 18+ Gay/Bi/Curious men go to discreet, enclosed, air-cooled Down Low Club at 7:45 Edelweiss for man-to-man action

title: Areal Silks Competition
description: We all know there are some talented aerialist out there. We want you to prove it! Great swag for the winner, or just because you show up.
print_description: We all know there are some talented aerialist out there. We want you to prove it! Great swag for the winner, or just because you show up.

title: Argentine Tango Beginner Lesson
description: This lesson will give you an introduction to the basics of Argentine Tango improvisation. Come and bring friends! Advanced and Intermediate dancers are welcome to support.
print_description: This lesson will give you an introduction to the basics of Argentine Tango improvisation. Advanced and Intermediate dancers are welcome to support.

title: Art Car Builder Meet Up at the Pier
description: Wouldn't it be cool to get together with other art car builders? Aren't you curious how long it took those guys to build that thing or how many gallons of propane they go through each night? Check out each other's cars and talk shop, share war stories and build techniques. Meet up with us (look for DiscoFish) near the start of the pier, and bring your art car!
print_description: Get together with art car builders, talk shop, swap build stories and techniques. Learn and share, meet at the pier (look for DiscoFish)

title: Dig the Remix Volleyball Tournament
description: Come get your playa game on and/or your groove on!
print_description: Come get your playa game on and/or your groove on!

title: Art in Three Dimensions
description: Don our red/cyan 3-D glasses and view the world in a new light! Our prolific and fecund artists invite you to gaze beyond the oh so flat land we are living in to much more pregnant sights. Even our 2-D artists have images to protrude into your mind and fertilize your imagination.
print_description: Don red/cyan 3-D glasses and view the world in a new light! Our prolific and fecund artistes invite you to gaze way beyond the flat world you live in.

title: Art Model Camp
description:
The Art Model camp provides a place to do figure drawing, and/or pose for drawings, no experience necessary for either.  Male and female models, 5-20 minute poses, with some artist supplies available (sketch pads and pencils, charcoal).

Noon to 3 pm Monday through Sunday, with a bar afterward (for as many days as the booze lasts).

We're located in the AEZ camp (camp #TBD, on the F side near 6:30).
print_description: A place for figure drawing and posing (no exp nec).  M/F models, 5-20 min poses, some supplies available. With a bar after (while the booze lasts).

title: ART PSALMS with Alex Grey
description:
The power of art as a trans-formative path is the theme of Alex Grey's inspiring collection of poetry, prayers and “mystic rants” that fuse visionary creativity and spirituality. These oracular declarations received from "The Voice at Dawn," show that both art’s creation and observation can be a practice of love and communion with the divine.

Th. and Fri. nights from 10pm-11pm
@Area 51
7:00 and Esplanade
print_description: Alex Grey's inspiring collection of poetry, prayers and “mystic rants” that fuse visionary creativity and spirituality.

title: Art Therapy Sessions
description: Each day a new medium and subject will be available on our Art Therapy wall. Channel your inner artist, get out any aggressions, express your love for the burn...all on our 16' art therapy wall. Please come and express yo self!
print_description: Each day a new medium and subject will be available on our Art Therapy wall. Channel your inner artist, get out any aggressions, express your love.

title: ART Tour - Bikes
description: It's all about the ART projects and the fabulous ARTISTS and their teams who create them! Ride your bikes as volunteers from the ARTery provide information on curated art pieces, as well as the Temple and The Man. Also note that there are separate ARTery Guided tours (buses for those with mobility issues), as well as self-guided (paper) tours available at the ARTery (on Esplanade).
print_description: ARTery staff bike tours of curated art projects.  Weather permitting Tues - Fri @ 10 Am & 2 PM.  They last about an hour or more.

title: Ash Qadosh - Planetary Alchemical Transformation
description:
Ash Qadosh - The Holy Fire of Planetary Alchemical Transformation:  

The esoteric secrets of Alchemy, Tantric Yoga, Hermetic Qaballah, Thelemic Magick and the Western Mystery School Traditions coalesce to ignite the fires of global transformation.  Join Frater Hrumachis of the Ordo Templi Orientis as he offers this engaging presentation on the Mysteries of the Great Work that lies at the heart of the alchemical transmutation of our Earth into the New Paradigm of human consciousness and planetary evolution .
print_description: Esoteric secrets of many ancient schools coalesce in the transmutation of Earth into the New Paradigm of human consciousness & planetary evolution...

title: Ask An Asian
description: Always had a question you wanted to ask, but were afraid it'd be offensive? Come ask our panel of Asian people, hosted at Asian Fetish Camp in the Alternative Energy Zone (or just come and have some of our tea).  All questions are welcome, nothing will be deemed too offensive; unless, of course, you're being a douche in which case we'll bust out our mad ninja kung fu skills and get all feudal on your ass.
print_description: Always had a question you wanted to ask, but were afraid it'd be offensive? Come ask our panel of Asian people, at Asian Fetish Camp, in AEZ.

title: Ask-a-Vegan Booth
description: Vegans live happy, healthy lives without the use of animal products.  Do you have questions?  Have you always wondered where we get our protein, or why we don't eat eggs or dairy?  Here's your chance to ask a real, live vegan (and get a treat!).
print_description: Vegans live happy, healthy lives without animal products. Do you have questions? Here's your chance to ask a real, live vegan (and get a treat!).

title: Astropups2012 presents: ROCKET
description: ROCKET parties in SF have gone off hard with an epic mix of hot guys, jaw-dropping performances, and big dancefloor beats from founding DJs Mat dos Santos, David Sternesky, Trevor Sigler, and Brian Maier. Now, with the help of the ever-frisky Astropups, ROCKET is making its inaugural party a night to remember. We are preparing to dock, ready to unleash a serious payload of fun to the Playa. Darktards beware because ROCKET is about to go SUPERNOVA!
print_description: ROCKET makes its Playa debut with an epic payload of dancefloor beats/performances brought to you by DJ Dos Santos and Brian Maier. ALL SYSTEMS GO!

Flying Spaghetti Monster Al Dente Soirée

San Diego New Atheists and Agnostics would like to invite all hedonists, heretics, infidels, and cosmically confused to a holy communion of His Noodly Body and Savory Blood infused with seven sacred herbs and spices. We even have special Noodly Body for the gluten intolerant. Oh, and did I mention the open bar?

title: A Thousand Hands
description:
Lakshmi appears to us with gold coins flowing from her hands. We all embody Lakshmi, showering gifts upon our community when we are supported. The Be Embodied Ceremonial Troupe will lead a participatory, multi-sensory event to open up the flow of juicy creativity and passion. Join our circle as we honor the energy of Lakshmi, giving and receiving in one Divine dance!

Dress your sweet self in red, gold and magenta.  Stay on at Sacred Spaces for the party to follow
print_description: We all embody Lakshmi, showering gifts upon our community. The Ceremonial Troupe will lead a participatory event to open up the flow of creativity.

We are your place for love away from your camp mates to get it on with your playa friends. Can't find a place to safe-sex it up on playa? Come to "And Then There's Only Love"! We have a fully equipped, environmentally sealed space for lovers to play day or night! With massage table, mattresses, sheets, supplies, and surprises you can share. *** Open to couples and moresomes of all genders and preferences.

The leader of the Danish Nihilist People's Party explains why all values are illusions and how this is key for true Authenticity. Nothing is better!

description: A fun, social, vulnerable exploration of profoundly seeing and being seen, where there is nothing to 'get' and judgements and distractions fade away.

title: Authentic Relating Games: Spontaneity
description: Even here, our habit is to anticipate and try to control the future. What happens when we truly let go and play in the mystery of "What's Next?"
print_description: Even here, our habit is to anticipate and try to control the future. What happens when we truly let go and play in the mystery of "What's Next?"

description: Come play with us in the forbidden realm of default culture’s greatest taboo:  whatever’s actually happening right here, right now, between us.

title: AutoSub's AfterBurn Party
description: Shake off those embers and party 'till sunrise with some of New England's favorite DJ's inside our "higher than ever" dome, and our unique upper level hammock netting! Lineup: 12-1am: Dysphemic & Miss Eliza; 1-2am: Goma Kas; 2-3am: Tamino; 3-4am: Encanti; 4-5am: Keith Mattar; 5-6am: Dewb
print_description: Shake off those embers and party 'till sunrise with some of New England's favorite DJ's inside our "higher than ever" dome.

title: Awareness of Awareness Unleashes the 10 Principles
description: Dr Frank once again brings his enlightening talk about the awareness of your awareness and how it relates tot he 10 principles.
print_description: Dr Frank once again brings his enlightening talk about the awareness of your awareness and how it relates tot he 10 principles.

title: Awesome Station
description: The pride and joy of our camp will be the Awesome Stations : four shaded, comfy chairs where visitors, such as yourself, will be welcomed by us to ‘Have A Seat!’ and made to feel awesome. Need a rest ? Finding yourself lost on the playa ? Our uplifting camp conversationalists will get to know you, your story and celebrate all the things that make you such a joy to the world ! Various surprise services may also be offered. At the end, you will be offered an envelope, paper and pen to write a letter to your Awesome Future Self about your time on the playa. We will collect the self-addressed letter and depending on your preference, mail it to you 1, 6 or 12 months after the Burn. Not only will you leave us with an uplifted heart but hopefully find yourself pleasantly surprised (by yourself!) in the following year.
print_description: Comfy shaded chairs to relax, share stories, & get surprise gifts. You'll leave feeling awesome! Even write a letter for the future that we'll mail.

title: A Wide Open Mic
description: So you say you’re not quite ready for Center Camp Stage prime time? Our Wide Open Mic is fully lubed and ready for you to give it your all, whether you’re a singer, a poet, an instrumentalist, or a lover - of entertainment. Pollinate your sound vibes across our corner of the Playa. Come and sign up early for a slot on our friendly mini-stage!
print_description: So you say you’re not quite ready for Center Camp Stage prime time? Our Wide Open Mic is so lubed & ready for you to give it your all. Sign up early!

title: Axis Mundi: Building Heaven on Earth
description: Presented by Lion Isis.  In this talk we delve into the deeper layers of the 2012 phenomenon, exploring technological singularity, Zion and the 3rd Temple, the Tree of Life, 5th Dimensional DMT hyperspace, planetary systems design, and massively multi-player reality gaming.
print_description: This presentation by Lion Isis explores technological singularity, Zion and the 3 rd Temple, the Tree of Life, planetary systems design, and more.

Match wits with Blysse, Iron Rose's Bad-Accent Impressario, if you dare! Best challenger wins a prize. As usual, we will have some limited beverage options available, but if you're truly keen on waxing poetic in your Scottish brogue, then BYOB and contributions always welcome.

Topics might include drugs, sex, camping, tips & tricks, decompression, and "things and places that should never, under no circumstance be attempted by anyone, ever" ; )

title: BADLANDS funk jam
description:
BADLANDS funk jam, yo! A helluvalot can happen in a short amount of time....your ass will be shaking like you was drilling for oil.

Come and get down with us!

Bring an Instrument or amplification if you have it... plug into our sound system and lets make playa magic together! 

Don't be scared. A little musical train wreck is inevitable but survivable. If you suck, we'll just kick you off and let someone who can groove get on. I we suck, my deepest apologies but we can make it through together!

We wanna celebrate and jam and listen and dance to the grotesque amount of musical talent that gathers on the playa. All performers are welcome. We will have a rigging point up for aerial arts.

DJ's jamming with guitar, bass, drums, keys, singers, cellos, accordions, kazoos, fiddles, bassoons and baboons. It's like the "I have a dream" speech but with instruments! the MOOPsquad will be with us, drinks will be available...

I am a little worried that some things are going to get a little out of hand.... but that's what we all came for, isn't it?

Come and jam with us in the BADLANDS Funk Dome!
print_description: BADLANDS funk jam, yo! Come get down with us! If you suck, we'll just kick you off and let someone who can groove get on... BADLANDS FUNK DOME!

title: Barbie Day Spa
description:
Barbies... come get pampered at the Barbie Day Spa.  
Massage, body wash, fingernail painting, sunscreen, and wine.
Located in Barbie Death Village.
Open most afternoons.  Hair washing available as water permits... bring some to share if you have extra.

Barbies... come get pampered at the Barbie Day Spa.

title: Barbie's Mobile Whorehouse Hot Dog Feed
description: For the past four years the sickest bastards on the playa, the Barbiebarians from Barbie Death Village have roamed the open playa after The Man burns and using our high-powered propane fire cannons cook up hundreds of hot dogs for the starving denizens of the playa.  Ask nicely and we'll even slip you a beer or margarita.  Our Barbie dogs come with all the trimmings as long as that means meat, bun, mustard, and ketchup.  After all, this ain't Burger King.  You don't get it your way, you get it our way and you'll like it.  Look for the double-decker party barge complete with Barbie doing despicable sexual acts on Ken and you know you've found us.  Barbies and hot dogs, two tastes that go together.
print_description: After the Man burns, if you can find us, we will feed you.  We have hot dogs for the first 400 hungry burners on the open playa. Good luck finding us.
other_location: Open playa in the middle of nowhere

title: Bare It With Us For Our 5th Naked Anniversary
description:
Today marks the 5th year for Party Naked Tiki Bar to see the Man burn. We will be celebrating our 5th Anniversary all day in the bar. Come by and get rid of your tan lines in a comfortable clothing optional setting. Sit and enjoy the rock music and meet new people.

See if you made the photo collage from previous years at Burning Man and don't forget to have Jim take one of you for this year's collage.

Our annual group photo of those brave enough to get naked will be between 2:45 and 3:00pm. Don't forget to wear your lei!
print_description: Celebrate our 5th Anniversary on the playa with us. Party Naked all day and wear your lei to get in on this year's group photo from 2:45 - 3:00pm.

title: Battle Shots
description: Kome Komrades! Choose Glorious Russian Navy or Capitalist Pig Navy. Fire away.Simple rules like Capitalist Pig Game known as "Battleship." When you hit, they drink from sinking boat. When you are hit, shot takes you! Capitalists drink whiskey - Russians drink VODKA! Perhaps special "Russian Roulette" version is more to your liking. Some shots water and some shots VODKA! Beer shots work too. Sorry, No Heineken! F THAT, Pabst Blue Ribbon!Play as you may on special Soviet built 2ft x 4ft red and black "Battle Shots" board. Can double as Anarcho-Sydacalist drinking games since is Red and Black.  Naval War Game available in and around Kantina APOKILIPTIKA all during this desert Kampaigne per order of Beloved Despot - as long as Kantina is open.Kantina Hours are as follows. Kantina is Open when Open. Kantina is closed when closed. Enjoy classic, glorious and inspirational Soviet music while sinking Capitalist Pig Navy into the Playa Dust of History Bin! As there are 17 shots per Battle, is suggested one choose carefully size of shots as well as content of shots!Special singing of Soviet Victory Song each time we hear a Capitalist say "Awe... You Sunk My Battleship!" (Sorry, No Monopoly Games Allowed!) Battle Shots, ONLY! Kantina APOKILIPTIKA is Konvenently lokated at Kamp APOKILIPTIKA, The FINEST SOVIET THEME KAMP IN ALL OF BLACK ROCK CITY!
print_description: Glorious Naval Battle (drinking) Game at Kantina APOKILIPTIKA! Sink the Capitalist Pig's Navy or Get Sunk and Drunk.Large Board-Many Boats-Many shots!

title: Bboying 101
description:
Open class with basic stretching.
Briefly explain the fundamental elements of B-boying.

Toprock is the foremost opening display of style and introduction to any move.

Footwork is movement on the floor with hands supporting the dancer as much as the feet involving variations using knees and threading limbs.

Freezes are stylish poses suspending the off the ground using upper body strength. It is often signaled the completion of one's set.

Power moves are acrobatic moves that require momentum, speed, endurance, strength, and control creating circular momentum. (advanced)

Flavor is about combining all the elements, learning musicality, and developing one's own style.

Last 15 minutes of class, all participants will join together in a fun dance cypher to let loose and show what they've learned.
print_description: Bboying 101

title: Become a Robot
description:
The future is here! Be born again – AS A MIGHTY ROBOT! 

Discard your pathetic human flesh and upgrade yourself! The Robot Factory provides all the materials you need to turn yourself into an amazing cardboard box robot. Transform yourself from Monday-Saturday, 2pm to 4pm. Robo-Coolant and Essential Fluids served at the bar. Calibrate your upgraded aural sensors with our high technology musics, flex your new bio-servos on our cybernetic dance floor.

BECOME A BETTER YOU – AT THE ROBOT FACTORY!

Once you have joined our ranks, be sure to return on Friday night for a ROBOT RAMPAGE starting at 8pm. An army of cardboard enhanced cyber-converts will meet at our camp, fuel up, then storm the Playa as a boozed up, belligerent, cardboard horde.

Take your body to 2.0 and join us, feeble flesh-bags!

title: BeLove in Yourself
description: This workshop is compiled of life learning experiences of creating joy and self Love. I will share with you the things you forgot you knew on how to fully Love and take care of yourself. When you are in a heart space of full Love and respect, you provide space for others to thrive. Simple tasks, games and reminders to promote self Love and confidence. Using techniques, meditations, affirmations and energetic activations to teach you to use your tools to create your shrine. You deserve Love. You deserve respect. You deserve everything this wonderful Universe has to offer. You already have it in you. By creating this space for yourself you not only provide inner healing but an amazingly perpetual ripple effect of healing for all that you interact with. Reshape relationships, circumstance and your whole life situation by coming in to your well deserved Love! Get ready to let loose, have fun and be every microscopic Love particle of your being!
print_description: This workshop is compiled of life learning experiences of creating joy and self Love. You will learn how to fully Love and take care of yourself.

title: Billion Jelly Bloom: Playa Participatory Bloom
description:
ONE NIGHT ONLY: Come undulate with us! 

A 'Yes' RSVP is non-binding but will help us get the word out about the event. Join us for a short while or for the entire 2 hours. Performers will rotate throughout the night, so even when more than 25 show up, you will certainly get a turn!

We will have 25 luminous floating jellies for the performance. Just look for the glowing jellyfish in front of Disorient (3:30 and Esplanade) at/around 10pm on Wednesday night. From there we will float & sway and bring wonder to the night playa inhabitants. No jellyfish experience required. 

Billion Jelly Bloom is a Burning Man 2011 art project that undulates + articulates a luminous jellyfish bloom through the night playa. Our mobile performance jellyfish sculptures attract + invoke spontaneous human-jelly playa encounters.

Bloom on.

title: Bipolar Bears Support Group
description:
The playa can wreak havoc on a "normally" wired brain, but when the sensory overload of Burning Man is combined with Bipolar it can be especially daunting to cope with. We're here to support you. We also want to offer a place for people to talk about their coping strategies and serve as a resource to those in need. Discuss how to avoid or at least mitigate triggers. Offer stories of what has been successful and what hasn't worked as well for you. Or just come to listen and know you are not alone. 

For those in need of more acute counseling and treatment, we encourage you to seek out the mental health services offered on the playa, and assist you to take advantage of them if needed.
print_description: Struggling with Bipolar cycles? Have any coping strategies to share? Just want to chat with people who understand? Join our support group!

title: Black Rock City Airbrush 24 Hour Airbrush-A-Thon
description: Black Rock City Airbrush 24 Hour Airbrush-A-Thon.Volunteer Airbrush Artists needed! Can't airbrush? No worries! if you have a pulse and an opposable thumb, you can be trained! Come join El Pulpo, Jake-a-saurus, Scorch, and Seth as they take on a 24 hour airbrush marathon. We never have enough volunteer artists so get ready to airbrush! This is a completely interactive and participative event. Expect to airbrush and interact with the camp! We will be doing custom Airbrush T-shirts, airbrush body painting, and teaching how to work a double-action airbrush around the clock. You say it we spray it! Bring energy drinks!

description: What a way to start Critical Tits day.  Our Playa Picassos at Black Rock City Body & Paint, nestled at the piano bar within Barbie Death Camp, will not only be painting all comers--male and female alike--but serving wine and Otter Pops to the assembled masses.  Lay back and get professionally decorated while being waited on hand and foot by the minions who are at your beck and call.  BRCB&P has been voted twice "The Best Body Painting Camp on the Playa".  So come on by and prepare to be pampered.  A splendid time is guaranteed for all.

title: Black Rock Educators Consortium
description: Black Rock Educators Consortium is an annual professional development opportunity that runs parallel to and in conjunction with the larger art festival in Black Rock City.As educators, we all bring so much back to our classrooms from the playa. The goal of BREC is to create a staff development opportunity unlike any other- where we help each other to bring the magic home to our students. All educators are welcome; Early-childhood ed, K-12, higher ed, adult ed, certificated, classified, administrator or school board member, all are welcome! We all have something to share. Teach a breakout session! Collaborate on lesson plans! Bring home a slick flyer to share with your fellow educators!
print_description: An annual gathering of educators seeking to improve instruction through our Burning Man experiences.  Pick up a legitimate-looking conference flyer!

title: Black Rock Scout ARTery Tour
description:
Description: 

Scouts and their parents will put the camera skills they learned from Media Mecca to good use on the art tour hosted by the Artery. The Artery will provide us two Mutant Vehicles, two guides and two navigators to take 25 to 40 people on a tour through art installations throughout the playa. Scouts will disembark and physically explore the installations. Scouts will also take photos that will later be gathered into a publication that will be available at the Black Rock Scout’s headquarters at the end of the burn. 



About The Artery:

The mission of the ARTery is to serve and defend artistic expression at Burning Man. The goal of the Artery is as an artistic resource center that facilitates the placement and display of art on the playa during the Burning Man Event. Their efforts are year round as they read through art applications, help artists through the installation process, keep records on art that has been and will be, so participants can be inspired again and again.

Black Rock Scouts hosts events for kids and their parents (parents must attend).

title: Black Rock Scouts and Thunderdome
description:
Description: 

The Death Guild is graciously hosting a Thunderdome match at the BIG Thunderdome on the playa, especially for teens aged 10 to 17. Scouts and their parents will meet at kidsville and bike to the Thunderdome (or be driven if a vehicle is available). Participants will be matched up with an opponent of equal size and weight and will be taken on a first come-first served basis. ALL participants must have a parent or guardian present to fight. Although safety padding and padded weapons are used, there is a risk of injury so participants fight at their own risk. Families and kids of all ages are invited to come watch the match.  

About Death Guild: 

Death Guild is one of  the oldest continually operating gothic/industrial dance club in the United States. The Death Guild crew is responsible for the construction and operation of Thunderdome, which has been very popular attraction at Burning Man since the mid 1990s.

title: Black Rock Scouts/ MOOP Race
description: Calling all Black Rock Scouts to join us for a MOOP investigation and race! Come learn about Black Rock City's first trash fence, the stuff we find these days, and test your MOOP catching skills.  Cool icy rewards for all winners!  Kids event!

title: Black Rock Scouts Night Art Tour
description:
Description: 

Scouts and their parents will ride in a large, exciting Mutant vehicle out to see the night sights on the playa. Known stops will include Thunderdome, Nexus Pyrosphere, Portapotties, and the amazing big night/fire art that otherwise would be out of walking distance for some Kidsville citizens. Bring warm clothes/blankets as the nights are cold in the desert. There will be gift opportunities for participants and hot chocolate.

title: Black Rock Scouts with Animal Control
description:
Description: 

Every year, thousands of bunnies run rampant during the Billion Bunny March.  Animal Control diligently and humanely captures, vaccinates and tags bunnies, kitties and other wild animals during the March. Scouts and their parents will be trained on how to safely catch animal-human hybrids and will put their training to use at the Billion Bunny. 

Scouts meet at BRS in Kidsville and should bring a blank red T-shirt to make into an Animal Control uniform. Bring a large fish net on a pole and carrots on a fishing pole (bunnies can’t resist). Scouts will walk to the meeting place on the playa, where training will take place on just before Billion Bunny. 


About Animal Control: 

Since 2001, Black Rock City Animal Control (BRCAC) has tagged and inoculated countless playa animals. Safety and security from wild and rabid animals are our promises to you. BRCAC also continues to act out all over playa with playful shticks you're come to love such as Pit Crew, Chapstick Commandos,  Bad Idea Camp, and our quest to find the "Winner" of Burning Man with Trophy Camp.

title: Black Rock Scouts with DMV
description:
Description: 

	You and your scout will be picked up by an art car and enjoy an interesting ride over to the Department of Mutant Vehicles (DMV).  The DMV is a very short drive from Kidsville. On the way JJ of the DMV will explain the criteria for “creating” a Mutant Vehicle and point out interesting types of vehicles we pass along the way. At the DMV you and your scout will meet the DMV team (called “the DMV Hotties”) and help the Hotties inspect some vehicles. On the ride back we will all decide which inspected vehicle is worthy of the kids Choice Award for best mutant vehicle. JJ will return scouts and their parents to Kidsville at about 12:00 noon. 

About the Department of Mutant Vehicles and DMV Hotties


The Black Rock City Department of Mutant Vehicles licenses motorized mobile works of creative expression otherwise known as Mutant Vehicles. 

A crew of DMV Hotties work there day and night to ensure that all vehicles pass safety and creativity standards. The DMV Hotties perform a variety of tasks on and off playa including on-line pre-registration processing, and on playa inspection, licensing and processing of Mutant Vehicles.

Thursday 10:45am at the center of Kidsville (5:30 between D and F)
Black Rock Scouts hosts events for kids and their parents (parents must attend).

title: Black Rock Scouts with Dragon Smelter
description:
Description: 

Danny of Dragon Smelters has a wealth of knowledge of both smelting and metalworking, and a history of coin currency. Scouts have the chance to make their own count out of recycled aluminum cans at Recycle Camp. 

This year Danny has invited the Black Rock Scouts to join him. This is a good time to collect cans from your neighborhood to bring to Recycle Camp. Scouts will meet at BRS headquarters and walk or drive to Recycle Camp at the back of Center Camp. 




About Dragon Smelters:


Transforming metal into art is their practice and passion. This is how they have participated in Burning Man for over a decade. Currency is an important aspect of any city around the world, since Dragon Smelters believe deeply that the Burning Man event is a place where gifting is the rule, the coin represents the theme of Fertility by creating a beautiful object from recycling so this keep sake can be exchanged as a token of positive energy between all participants.

title: Black Rock Scouts with Earth Guardians
description:
Description: 

Scouts and their parents meet at BRS headquarters and walk or bike to Earth Guardians on the Esplenade.First there will be a puppet show where they will learn about what Earth Guardians do and the importance of MOOPing. 

Scouts will then be given their own reusable MOOP bag that they will personalize with sharpies. Scouts will then fan out for 30 minutes to do a group MOOP around the Esplenade. Upon return to Earth Guardians, MOOPers will be thanked with Otter pops. 


About Earth Guardians:

Earth Guardians inspire the Burning Man community to embrace Leave No Trace (LNT) principles and practices. They also visit the Black Rock desert outside of the Burning Man event both to introduce participants to the beauty of the area and to participate in restoration and education activities.

title: Black Rock Scouts with Fire Dept (EDS)
description:
Description: 

The Emergency Services Department is made up of several departments. The Fire Department will bring a fire truck to BRS headquarters in Kidsville, where scouts and their parents will learn about fire safety and about the firefighters who volunteer. 

Scouts will then be taken to the Fire Department outpost via fire truck, where they will be given a chance to use a fire hose. Parents should bike along the fire truck (with kid carrier) for the ride back to Kidsville. 



About Emergency Services Department: 

Black Rock City's Emergency Services Department (ESD) is there when you need them months before the event officially starts, and are on-duty well after the last participant leaves to support the playa clean-up efforts. ESD provides Black Rock City with several different key areas of service; these services include Fire Fighting, Rescue, Hazardous Materials, Emergency and Non-Emergency Medical evaluation and treatment, Mental Health services (including sexual assault response), 911 Dispatch, and providing the two-way radio communications infrastructure for all of Black Rock City.

title: Black Rock Scouts with Gate
description:
Description: 

The Gate Bus will pick you and your scout up inside Kidsville.  You will be greeted by Yando, a1950s Greyhound bus driver, and Zed, his flight attendant. Yando and Zed will tell you all about the Gate as you drive out Gate Road.  Safety is number 1 with the Gate crew and if the weather and the traffic conditions are right, you and your scout will find yourselves searching cars for stowaways and other contraband (dogs, fireworks and  MOOP Makers) in incoming vehicles.  If the conditions are not safe, don’t worry because the Gate crew always has shelter and something fun up their sleeves. 

About Gate: 

Gate processes all the arriving cars and tears your burning man ticket. We are the dusty people who search every car, truck, and RV looking for things that create MOOP and other things that are not allowed.

Perimeter is the force in the desert that keeps a keen lookout for people who are lost.

Exodus is the team that you see when you leave burning man. We are the line between here and there. We are the hard edge. We are the last stop before and after bliss. We are the dust.

We are all three departments all rolled up into one, we are the GATE... and we can't wait to meet you kids!

BRS with Gate
Wednesday 1:45 to 3:30 at the center of Kidsville (5:30 between D) 
and F).Black Rock Scouts hosts events for kids and their parents

title: Black Rock Scouts with Greeters
description:
Description: 

When burners arrive at the Greeters Station, they are warmly greeted with hugs, maps, information and a chance to ring the bell (if virgins). Scouts will be assigned two lanes at the Greeters Station where scout/parent teams will be trained and partnered up with other BRS teams. Teams may also be Traffic Rangers, directing cars in with the orange batons. 

Because we are dealing with moving cars, this event is recommended for Scouts age 6 and up, with a parent of course. There are potties and a shaded lounge at Greeters. 

Bring water, gum for dry throats, lip balm, snacks, a sun hat and some fun! Wear your BRS bandanas and patches! Scouts will be picked up and returned to Kidsville via art car.

About Greeters:

Greeters make the first impression when burners come home. Greeting is a vital role that helps shape and form the initial perceptions and expectations of first time participants. Greeting is the one and only chance to communicate with each and every participant on a one-on-one basis, mano-a-mano, facia-a-facia.

Armed with wit, wisdom and infectious exuberance, Greeters take advantage of this opportunity by becoming skilled information providers conducting helpful, informational workshops to carloads of people.

title: Black Rock Scouts with Hardware
description:
Description: 

 Hardware will show scouts and their parents how they handle customers that make requests for legitimate repairs. Hardware will also show scouts how to use the tools that they have on hand, proper safety for using the 	tools, and of course how wonderful duct tape is.

About Hardware: 


Black Rock City Municipal Hardware Shoppe is a Burning Man theme camp that has been a part of the event since 1999. Their primary mission is to provide tools, materials, and skills as a public service to the fellow citizens of Black Rock City. They pride themselves on their ability to fix (or at least juryrig) almost any problem you can think up. The more interesting it is, the harder we’ll work to give you the best fix possible. If they can’t fix it or suggest somebody else who can, they will give you a big hug to help you forget your troubles.

title: Black Rock Scouts with Lamp Lighters
description:
Description: 

Black Rock Scouts and their parents will meet at the center of Kidsville and we will walk to the Lamplighter station. There we will don our ceremonial lamplighter garb and help light the playa. Carrying kerosene lanterns,  Scouts will being doing more than providing a utility, Scouts will be performing a duty that is a symbol of participation in our community, and the magic of evening will be upon us (especially for the Black Rock Scouts because that evening we are going on Night Art Tour!). 

About Lamplighters: 

The Lamplighting ritual at Burning Man is a quiet an essential part of the communal desert experience.  It creates a sense of a real city with street lamps and invokes an old tradition of lamplighting that contrasts nicely with the technical innovations of today. Check out this awesome blogpost to learn more about the history of lamplighting at Burning Man. 

Http://blog.burningman.com/2010/06metropol/lamplighting-ritualizing-	functional-necessity. 

The Lamplighters draw more than 100 participants every evening of the event. In 1993 there were a dozen lanterns; now there are nearly 1000 to lift onto the spires that line the Esplanade pathways to the Man. To accomplish this considerable task, they ask for your help, and this year, they are inviting Black Rock Scouts and their parents to be a part of this community, this event, and their tradition. By the time the event ends, more than 1000 people will have helped the Lamplighters accomplish their important work.
print_description:
Black Rock Scouts host events for kids and their parents (parents must attend.

5:00pm on Tuesday at the center of Kidsville (5:30 between Dand F).

title: Black Rock Scouts with Media Mecca
description:
Description:

When scouts arrive at Media Mecca, they will be greeted by Media Team volunteers. Each scout will receive both a laminated scout-specific media tag which is attached to their cameras and a matching laminate to be worn around their necks. Once scouts have been inducted to the sacred alter of Free Press, scouts will take part in a short 45 to 60 minute presentation by Media Mecca photographer and blogger, John Curley.  Scouts will learn how best to capture photographs on the playa and how to vision their story when they set out for the proceeding Art Tour. After the Art Tour, Black Rock Scout leaders will collect your digital images and they will be memorialized in print by Saturday. 

About Media Mecca:

The Media Team is composed of a daring, dedicated, professional, fun-loving and largely well-behaved set of volunteers. Since 1997, their motley group of journalists, marketers, flacks, sociologists, technical writers, filmmakers, artists, anthropologists, IT professionals, art experts, budding rock stars, freaks, geeks, and ne'erdowells have helped members of the media plug in to the event, participate, and hopefully come away with a good story.

title: Black Rock Scouts with Pier 2.0
description:
Description: 

 In 2011 Black Rock Scouts and Kidsville visited the Pier as part of the Art Tour, and the Pier was selected as "Kids Choice Award" for best Art installation. In 2012 we have planned visits to the Pier 2.0 on Tuesday during the Night Art Tour, and possibly on Wednesday during the Day Art Tour, but these two visits will only be appetizers before the Main Pier 2.0 Event. Friday will be a dedicated visit to Pier 2.0 and at the end of the pier, there will be a Spanish Galleon shipwreck we can all explore. Transportation will be in large fanciful ships, boats, and vessels. The Pier crew will meet us in pirate garb and speak and provide us our own personal tour. We will be climbing through the Spanish galleon wreck and search for clues to the occupants. Michelle, a member of the Pier’s building crew (and an burner parent) will be hosting the event and explaining the artifacts.

About Pier 2.0


Pier 2 is a magnification of Pier 1 in 2011. This is the second chapter in the life of a beloved piece of art. The stage for serendipity is now a launching pad for a grand tale as told through the remnants of a dead ship. Their intention is to create a story out of our art. They are replacing the words with experience and the chapters with exploration. Pier 2 will consist of 2 components: The Pier and The Ship. You can read more about the Pier 2.0 on their facebook page here:  

 http://www.facebook.com/ThePier2012

title: Black Rock Solar's Solar Playa International
description:
Join Black Rock Solar at its annual event, Solar Playa International. While sipping on a mint julep or ice cold beer, you will get a chance to meet the staff and crew of Black Rock Solar as well as other Burners doing meaningful and innovative work around the country.  The purpose of this event is to bring together all of the different groups and individuals on playa doing work in renewable energy, climate change, environmental outreach, and policy.  Tell us about your projects and learn about ours. 

Since 2007 Black Rock Solar has been building solar arrays in Nevada and giving them away at little or no cost, over 2 megawatts of clean renewable energy to date.  BRS prioritizes installations for schools, hospitals, rural communities, non-profit groups, and Native American tribes.
print_description: Have a cold mint julep, learn about our projects, tell us what you’re doing in the world of renewable energy, climate change & environmental outreach.

title: Blues Dance with TUIB
description:
Learn how to partner dance with Tangoed up in Blues (Monday-Thursday).  We teach tango and blues classes, follow them up with practice time, then happy hour (often with live music), and dances in the evenings.  Tango milongas are Monday and Wednesday, Blues dances on Tuesday and Thursday.

In our classes, you'll learn how to do these two social partner dances, how to connect with the music and your partner, how to relax, you'll get to meet and interact with your playa brethren, and you'll dance a bunch.

During the guided practice time, you'll have a chance to practice during the day and ask questions of the experienced dancers hanging out.

At happy hour, grab a drink, dance and chill. Listen to live music if we have a drop-in musician (or let us know if you you'd like to play some blues or tango music at our camp).

And then in the evening, dress up, and come dance the night away.  We keep the music running at all hours.
print_description: Come out and partner dance with Tangoed up in Blues.  We teach tango and blues classes and host dances in the evenings.  Come early for the class.

description: Come enjoy a delicious blindfolded feast, sans utensils. In the spirit of self-reliance, please bring your own water to drink and plate to be served on.

description: Belly dance is one of the best ways to connect with the flow of the body. Though the origin is unknown, belly dance has been linked to ritual fertility dances from thousands of years ago and continues to celebrate the creation of life. A great form of exercise for anybody, it helps to lengthen and strengthen muscles, as well as the mind.

title: Bodyrock Your Bod
description: It's great interval exercise and leaves you zooming so high on endorphins. It includes a 5 minute warm up, a 12 minute circuit exercise routine, and a 15 minute stretching sequence. The whole process takes about 30 to 45 minutes with varied multiple circuit routines. It's a lot of fun - a great way to warm up your bod for a day of fun in the sun and dust. Come on in; participate! Stretch this! Bring a towel for comfort, water for health.

title: BOOTIE BRC: AutoSub
description: OMG MUSIC WITH WORDS! Now in its seventh year on the playa, A Plus D -- aka DJs Adrian & Mysterious D -- bring BOOTIE BRC, the internationally-infamous mashup bootleg party, to Black Rock City! With special guest DJs and mashup shows and performances throughout the night, Bootie BRC keeps your brain guessing and body dancing with creative song combinations, celebrating -- and satirizing -- pop culture, both past and present. Mixing and mashing every musical genre, era, and style into one big dance party, it's the soundtrack for the A.D.D. generation -- with free mashup CDs given away like candy! Launched in 2003 in San Francisco, Bootie was the first club night dedicated solely to the burgeoning artform of the bootleg mashup, and is now the biggest mashup event in the world, with regular parties in several cities on four continents. Bootie BRC is presented in part by the BRC Weekly, Black Rock City's independent newsweekly.
print_description: OMG MUSIC WITH WORDS!! The greatest mashup party in the universe comes to BRC for its 7th year. DJs A Plus D and guests turn 2 songs into 1. Free CDs!

title: Booty Shakin' African Dance
description: Join Carrie and live drummers for an ecstatic African rhythmic experience that will make you move! We will learn traditional celebration dance sequences from West Africa. All levels welcome, dust or shine! Carrie is a devotee and lover of movement and embodiment in all forms. She is a certified Hatha Yoga teacher and has taught yoga and West African drumming and dance workshops around the world. Carrie has studied with master teachers in Guinea, Mali, and the US, and lives in the San Francisco Bay Area.

description: The Black Rock City Hash House Harriers are proud to sponsor the 5th running of the BRCH3 Red Dress Run. Meet at the Man in your best red dress and your running shoes. Bring a drinking vessel and a whistle if you can. We will lay a trail in BRC that you can run, jog, walk, slide, or bike to and end in a cold brew with a pack of crazies who sing songs, tell tall tales, and do our version of down-downs (crimes on trail). No red dress? So what! Grab something red. Too hot to run? Big deal! Bring your bike or walk the trail. It's clearly marked and there will be guides and bevvie stops along the way. You will have a great time and meet a great group of people!

title: BRC Ski Patrol Complaint Dept.
description:
Murphy’s Law doesn’t exist on the playa. No, when something goes wrong, it’s the BRC Ski Patrol that’s fuckin’ with ya!


No TP in the porta potty at the very moment you need it most? Don’t blame the ORG for not keeping it stocked, don’t blame yourself for not bringing your own, blame the damn Ski Patrol  - they must’ve hidden it!

Bike stuck in a pile o’ dust?  That damn ski patrol put it there just to fuck with you! 

You know you packed that tutu you slaved over  making. Now here it is, TuTu Tuesday, and it’s not there! It’s that damn Ski Patrol again... one of them must be wearing it!

You get the idea. Got something to blame on the Ski Patrol?   

BRC Ski Patrol Complaint Department will be open to take your complaints during various hours throughout the week.

"Good luck with that."
print_description: When shit goes wrong, blame the Ski Patrol! BRC Ski Patrol Complaint Dept. open to take your complaints during various hours throughout the week.

title: Breadmaking on the Playa!
description:
Learn the ins and outs of how to make delicious fresh baked bread in a 'primitive' environment.  Nuances, variations and so much more.

Learn basics of making bread dough and how to do it in a variable environment.  How to not get dough in your tutu, when to put on pasties and when not, and where sugar is a GOOD thing! 

Learn bread recipes, dough techniques, the importance of proofing (not the same as poofing!) and the joy of sticky fingers.

title: Bride Ride 2012
description:
Start planning now for BRIDE RIDE, Fertility 2012. Folks in bridal attire will unite for a spectacular playa ride.  

Bride Ride 2012, donning our chosen bridal attire (you are the bride), so pack a wedding dress.  

Past, present, future, imagined, symbolic, playful, silly, reflective, contemplative, joyous, heavy hearted, fulfilled, disappointed, younger, older brides are all welcome...come one, come all......come in your choice of playa wedding attire (something old, new, borrowed, or blue, bought for the ride, or have had on hand, whatever you choose).  

The plan is to gather for a sisterhood sunset ride and to celebrate fertility, womanhood, sisterhood, life, love, friendship, femininity, beauty or reflect, dream, remember, mourn, manifest.  It's all welcome. 

We will take a bike ride around the playa, route to be determined, and eventually make our way around to the temple to end our ride.

According to the Dreams Dictionary “To see wedding clothes, signifies you will participate in pleasing works and will meet new friends.”  So let’s make a "playa-dream" together, make new friends, find our own personal meaning in this symbolic act and in the process create some playa beauty too.

Meet in front of Camp RhythmWave, slated to be 4:45pm and Foxglove.
print_description: THE BRIDE RIDE, Fertility 2012.  Gather at 5:30pm, depart at 6pm for the ride. Departs from Rhythm Wave Camp (Foxglove & 4:45pm).

title: British Invasion Mad Hatters Teddy Bear Picnic
description:
THE BRITISH ARE INVADING!!! AAAAAARRGH! Don’t try to fight it – join in! And roll-up, roll-up for the Mad Hatter’s Teddy Bear Picnic…

Calling all Teddy Bears, Teddy Bares, Mad Hatters and assorted Great British & Non-British Eccentrics:

Because only Mad Dogs & Englishmen are out in the midday sun, come and join us on Friday, 31st August from 2.30 pm for a picnic afternoon tea all set to some jolly good tunes brought to you from Dave’s Disco, Lexi Fey, The Prince of Rinse and other guest DJs to be announced. 

Expect copious amounts of Pimms and tea which MUST be drunk with pinkie akimbo to wash down that oh so refined of all British morsels – the cucumber sandwich! Along with assorted other high-tea culinary delights to wrap your stiff upper lip around.

All will be wowed with a cornucopia of amusements in the original British game show “Crystal Tipps’ Maze”. There will be gifts for winners & forfeits for runners-up! (Draws will be decided with tickleathons & thumb wars).

Crystal Tipps’ Maze is a group game to be played in teams. Challenges will be physical, mental, environmental, sensual & luck-based. The game will comprise five rounds – the exact content of the rounds will be decided on the day but will be chosen from those published below:

1. Village fete – apple bobbing, hoops horseshoe throwing, hook-a-duck, tom bola, raffle, lucky dip,

2. Parlour games - Pin the tail on the donkey, playing cards, titillating tiddlywinks, twisted twister, thumb wars, tickleathon

3. Lawn games – think badminton, croquet and lawn bowls…with a twist

4. School sports day – rounders, sack racing, three-legged races, egg-and-spoon races

5. Pub games – Totopoly, Great British pub quiz, binge-drink bingo, goggles darts, playing card darts, tongue darts (oh no! that’s something else entirely ;-) maybe a prize?)

If you go out in the woods today You're sure of a big surprise!
print_description: THE BRITISH ARE INVADING!!! AAAAAARRGH! Don’t try to fight it – join in! And roll-up, roll-up for the Mad Hatter’s Teddy Bear Picnic…

title: Brunch House
description: Are you missing those moments of listening to that light fluffy house music while eating your brunch and drinking mimosas in that trendy restaurant? Well head over to Shadyvil for Brunch house. We'll have the seats and the beats to match the eats, all you need to do is dress the part. Be sure to dress for the occasion in your most stylish and trendy brunch attire, as there will be a bouncer regulating entry. Only the most stylish Brunchers will be allowed to enter inside our exclusive Cafe Shad. DJ's for this event will feature San Francisco's own Fedora. They will be inviting some friends to help create the hip soundtrack that you can enjoy your delicious and stylish brunch to. Who says you can't have stylish brunch on the playa?
print_description: Hip stylish brunch served in Cafe Chez-D. Trendy Deep House music provided by San Francisco's own Fedora. We serve until we run out.

title: Bubbles and Bass
description: We'll be rockin' you out from Sunrise til 11am with bubbly bass-tastic house music as you watch the sunrise over the playa and dance the AM hours away... and drink some bubbly while you boogie. We want to create a home of warmth and positive energy during the AM hours. Together with a team of artists, musicians, circus performers, dancers, planners, bartenders, builders, architects, thinkers, dreamers, and lovers, we are going to bring invigorating house music to the Burning Man community and a dance floor that gets everyone moving and shaking. We'll offer you champagne to relax and a comfy chill space to enjoy the sounds while resting your feet after a night of partying. We want to provide an environment conducive to connecting: spiritually, conversationally, and energetically.
print_description: We'll be rockin' you out with bubbly bass-tastic house music as you watch the sunrise over the playa, dance the AM hours away, and drink free bubbly!

title: Bug Hunt
description: It prowls the playa ... part machine ... part insect ... is that a screaming face growing out the front ... OMG ... the legs are moving!!! What madness is this? RUUUUUN! Find the "Grrr-sect", yell "SWEET!" and get one! We used to have a trampoline built in, but this year we are converting the entire back end into a better seating area and a whole insect "shell".  The URL provided isn't the new form, but it should help I.D. us enough.Open for playa rides as space allows!
print_description: It prowls the playa ... part machine ... part insect ... a screaming face ... are those legs moving?  Eeeek!  Find us and yell "sweet!" to get one!

title: Build your own mutant vehicle
description: ... out of plastic building blocks using your 'fertile' imagination. Then don't LEGO cuz you can take it with you! For humans of all ages.
print_description: ... out of plastic building blocks using your 'fertile' imagination. Then don't LEGO cuz you can take it with you! For humans of all ages.

title: Burgin Bootcamp
description: Seasoned Burners are here to ease your transition from Burgin to Burner! Come, laugh at us & learn from our humiliating misadventures in the School of Hard Knocks, BRC Campus. Our playful, interactive sessions include Playa Survival & Safety tips, Q&A, and randomly awarded "Burgin Cherry Kits" with items you didn't even know you needed!
print_description: Come, laugh, & learn from our humiliating misadventures.  Playa Survival & Safety tips, Q&A, & randomly awarded "Burgin-to-Burner Cherry Kits".

title: Burn After Reading Coffee House
description: Raised by Wolves & BAR MAG join together to create our coffeehouse at Sacred Spaces Village! Come visit us from 9:30am to noon, grab a cup of fresh brewed, Fair Trade coffee, and pick up a copy of Burn After Reading Magazine. There will be plenty of comfortable, shaded places to enjoy your joe, flip through the mag and relax to World Music. Please remember to bring a cup!
print_description: BAR MAG & Raised by Wolves join together to bring you fresh, fair-trade coffee, world music and a glossy copy of Burn After Reading Magazine.

title: Burn After Reading Coffee House and BARMag Visits
description: BAR MAG & Raised by Wolves join together to present our coffee house at Sacred Spaces Village! Come visit us from 9:30am to noon, grab a cup of fresh brewed, Fair Trade coffee, and watch a special premiere screening of Burn After Reading Magazine Visits; a documentary about the Burning Man community off-playa, featuring Colorado CORE, Greathouse Labs, Gateway Ranch, and the Clockship Tere. There will be plenty of comfortable, shaded places to enjoy your joe and relax. Please remember to bring a cup!
print_description: Come visit us from 9:30am to noon, grab a cup of joe, a copy of the mag and watch a premiere screening of our documentary, BARMag Visits!

title: Burn After Reading Coffee House and Story Telling
description: BAR MAG & Raised by Wolves join together to present our Coffee House at Sacred Spaces Village! Come visit us from 9:30am to noon, grab a cup of fresh brewed, Fair Trade coffee, and pick up a copy of Burn After Reading Magazine. We will also be hosting a collection of live storytelling. If you love an exciting tale, or have one to tell, come on by! There will be plenty of comfortable, shaded places to enjoy your joe and relax. Please remember to bring a cup!
print_description: If you love an exciting tale, or have one to tell, come on by! It's story time at BAR MAG Coffee House! Get a cup o joe, a copy of the mag and a tale!

title: Burn Buddy
description: Looking for those special somepeople to watch the burn? They're looking for you, too. Hook up, form a posse, make friends for life or just one night.
print_description: Looking for those special somepeople to watch the burn? They're looking for you, too. Hook up, form a posse, make friends for life or just one night.

title: Burn Day Blues Jam
description: Spend the afternoon before the burn with your heart in the right place. Jump on the backline, bring your guitar and bring the blues.
print_description: Spend the afternoon before the burn with your heart in the right place. Jump on  the backline, bring your guitar and bring the blues.

title: Burner Baptisms by Proxy
description:
Know someone who needs a Dust Baptism?
Do YOU need a Soul Cleansing?
Our great leaders done daily; volunteers needed.

title: Burner Mitzvah
description:
Shake it like a polariod picture to this throwback shindig of when you were 13!

First we will celebrate the 'coming of age' of a few burners as they take on 613 mitzvots and as many ways to make a drink on the playa. Join us for this spiritual journey of choice, chant and transformation during this beautiful afternoon Torah service.

Then we dance! Shake your thing in 80's style fashion and get ready to rock it out with the tribe for an afternoon dance party!
print_description: We celebrate the coming of age of a few burners as they take on 613 mitzvots in an afternoon Torah service. Then we rock out with the tribe 80s-style!

title: BURNERS AGAINST SCALPERS MEET & GREET
description:
This year is the FIRST year for a Burners Against Scalpers Group.It's time to high five each other and chill from the heat. Come play and visit a bit at the on Playa meet and greet. This will be a time to just chill in the shade and visit with people from our group,community, people walking by or just to that cuttie over there (that's me haha). A layed back place to get your social butterfly going and get out of the heat. I will be pulling people on skies behind my art boat before this is all over. Come over and visit us and let's relax and congregate together.

I do need some help from you all on here. No money needed but I will ask this, since I do not have it in the budget for mass booze (some booze just not a mass) and beer, I must ask that you bring your cup and whatever you have laying around your camp that will get you off and that you are willing to share with you friend here at the Burners Against Scalpers Party. If you have extra, and want to donate to this on playa event, just bring it to the meet and greet and we can mix it into something. Also if anyone wants to help plan this and kick it off, I welcome ideas and more ideas. I am not the best planner of events so please give your ideas and maybe your help setting up or planning or what ever...see you all there.
print_description: This year is the FIRST year for a Burners Against Scalpers Group.It's time to high five each other and chill from the heat. Come play and visit a bit.

title: Burners Without Borders and You!
description: Bring your wifi capable device to the 2-6 o'clock side of the playa to tap into BwBNet, an intra-playa wifi network (not connected to the default www) where you can access valuable BM info/maps and stay connected with friends and projects going on around BRC. The creator of BwB Net will host Q&A salon sessions Tuesday and Thursday from 1-2pm. afterward, from 2-3pm, BwB will host a general Q&A where you can learn about BwB's mission,current projects around the world, andhow to get involved or set up a BwB chapter in your hometown. While you're here, enjoy our live music stage and have a piece of your lovely outfit (really, you look just gorgeous) extra-snazzified at our daily live screen-printing booth.
print_description: BWB wants to help you create amazing civic projects in your community. Join us for a fun, roundtable discussion and get inspired!

title: Burners Without Matches
description: We are at VW BusCamp. Sit down,burn a wood medallion with a magnifying glass! This is DIY gifting! Runs daily: 10am to 2pm.
print_description: C'mon over, burn one with us! We have magnifying glasses & wood tokens for you to burn your own damn souvenir! Make a necklace or a pin. Be creative!!

title: Burn Garden - Toxic Avenger Training
description: Toxic avengers monitor the burn garden on Sunday, yes we watch fire! We're helping ensure that no nasties go into the burn platforms, that wood get recycled and that the platforms aren't overloaded so that our precious playa stays unscarred. Come to sign up and learn about this effort.
print_description: Toxic avengers monitor the burn gardens We're helping ensure that no nasties get burned, that wood get recycled and the playa stays unscarred. Join us

title: Burning Dawn
description: Burning Dawn! Prometheatrics continues it's daily dawn-fire tradition on the Esplanade. It's a beautiful time to spin fire, or to take gorgeous pictures of people who do. In loving memory of our camp mate Burning d@n, who loved the smell of white gas in the morning.
print_description: Burning Dawn! Prometheatrics continues its daily dawn-fire tradition on the Esplanade. What a beautiful time to spin! In loving memory of Burning d@n.

description:
EmCee Ryan and the Rockstars will be hosting the playa version of the famous TV show from 7pm-9pm.  Be an awesome participant to showcase YOUR unique talents on stage. 
Based on "America's Got Talent", our version will celebrate the self expression of the playa! Whether you play an instrument, do acrobatics, or silly human tricks you could win cool prizes!
